topic.title: Hello ZeroNet users from Bolivia
topic.body: Could you give us an update on that situation in your country?

1574728494_1JSLHCzeaMDeS1tGKUiYu1EFnKcr8.body:
> [1bfqutudhtexlka](#comment_67_144CwRj8eynTUC9DtGHaNHR3wm9P2EhuAY): is internet censored there too ?

well. maybe not the internet. however, western mainstream media coverage seems "limited". would be great to get some real peoples/witnesses reports.

> [pineapples](#comment_141_19XCfah7iuo9zYqk7GoTDXVNp4p5BpEH1T): you may have better luck posting in spanish in the Spanish zerohello

good point, will do.
